00078 bool InfoDialog::Create( wxWindow* parent, wxWindowID id, const wxString& caption, const wxPoint& pos, const wxSize& size, long style )
00079 {
00081     m_left_panel = NULL;
00082     m_left_sizer = NULL;
00084 
00086     SetExtraStyle(GetExtraStyle()|wxWS_EX_BLOCK_EVENTS);
00087     wxDialog::Create( parent, id, caption, pos, size, style );
00088 
00089     CreateControls();
00090     SetIcon(GetIconResource(wxT("app_icon.ico")));
00091     if (GetSizer())
00092     {
00093         GetSizer()->SetSizeHints(this);
00094     }
00096     return true;
00097 }

00183 wxBitmap InfoDialog::GetBitmapResource( const wxString& name )
00184 {
00185     // Bitmap retrieval
00187     wxUnusedVar(name);
00188     if (name == _T("caen.png"))
00189     {
00190         wxBitmap bitmap(_T("caen.png"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_PNG);
00191         return bitmap;
00192     }
00193     return wxNullBitmap;
00195 }
00196 
00201 wxIcon InfoDialog::GetIconResource( const wxString& name )
00202 {
00203     // Icon retrieval
00205     wxUnusedVar(name);
00206     if (name == _T("app_icon.ico"))
00207     {
00208         wxIcon icon(_T("app_icon.ico"), wxBITMAP_TYPE_ICO);
00209         return icon;
00210     }
00211     return wxNullIcon;
00213 }
